name: Don't Eat Cheese Before Sleeping
description:
Welp. Here it is.

Don't Eat Cheese Before Sleeping is my submission for Yandere Game Jam 2022.

It's also my very first VN where everything in it, music, art, code(mostly), etc, I made. Except the font. There's no way I could make a font.(Not yet at least.)

I went for more of a atmospheric scariness rather than visual scariness.

Warning: It does use Infrasound, which has been known to cause hallucinations and panic attacks. It can be disabled after you start the story.

Even though it does have infrasound, the game isn't really long enough to make use of it. 

Fredrik helped edit.
